Literature.Title: Optimization of antibacterial peptides by genetic algorithms and cheminformatics.
Literature.Author: Fjell CD, Jenssen H, Cheung WA, Hancock RE, Cherkasov A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa H103(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 213(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LES400(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ESBL 63103(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus C623(MIC=8µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium mic80(MIC=8µg/ml),Candida albicans C627(MIC=8µg/ml)
